title: RaceFace add Conspiracy DWR Jersey, loud shirts and more MTB riding kit for women
content:
RaceFace have announced their new mountain bike riding kit for 2021. There is of course the usual colorway updates to some long standing runners in the lineup, but there’s also a couple of loud and proud jerseys and unusual technical apparel items in there that caught our attention. The brand have also added significantly more […]

The post RaceFace add Conspiracy DWR Jersey, loud shirts and more MTB riding kit for women appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
